title: Moccaklatsch
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Beer/Wine, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small cafe offering a handful of vegan specific dishes on its menu card which includes vegan breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks and desserts. On the menu - V indicates vegetarian, and V with leaf indicates vegan options. Discount after 6pm as part of 'Thursday is veggie day' campaign, reported Sep 2014. Has soymilk.
